name: Calf Parrock Waymarked Walk, Wray Castle

ai.summary: An easy 2.2 km loop starting and finishing at Wray Castle, following well-marked paths through gentle terrain with scenic castle and countryside views. Suitable for families and casual walkers, typically taking about 45–60 minutes with minimal elevation gain.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating, on well-marked trails with a mix of gravel, soft earth and occasional grassy sections. Some uneven ground and exposed roots near field edges; surfaces can be muddy after rain. Expect scenic views of Wray Castle and surrounding landscape.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy walking shoes with good grip. Stay on marked paths and respect any closures. Check the weather forecast, as UK conditions can change quickly. Bring water and a snack, sun protection in sunny weather, and a light rain jacket. Keep children under supervision near castle grounds and lake edges. Carry a map or device with offline maps and tell someone your planned route if walking alone.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device / offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn; suitable year-round with caution in winter due to mud and weather

seo.title: Calf Parrock Waymarked Walk, Wray Castle – Easy 2.2 km UK Walk
seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 2.2 km waymarked loop around Wray Castle, UK. Family-friendly, scenic views and gentle trails suitable for beginners.
seo.h1: Calf Parrock Waymarked Walk, Wray Castle – Easy 2.2 km Walk
